entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
